metadata.title: CVE-2015-2940 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the CheckUser extensionfor MediaWiki allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofcertain users for requests that retrieve sensitive user information viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
